org.openimaj.image.processing

Class CLImageAnalyser<I extends Image<?,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.CLImageAnalyser<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Type of Image being processed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageAnalyser<I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLSobel

    public abstract class CLImageAnalyser<I extends Image<?,I>>
extends Object
implements ImageAnalyser<I>
    Base ImageAnalyser for GPGPU accelerated analysis.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
